name: Food Cooking Chef
description:
Your dream of becoming the best food cooking chef is about to come true with this amazing food stall cooking game.
The top food chef has arrived in the chef town to serve tasty and delicious foods to the people who like potato fries, noodles and many different kinds of soup with his amazing cooking skills. He has the best kitchen appliances among his trusted natural cooking instincts to win the hearts of everyone who tastes his lovely food. He can manage serving customers and preparing new foods at the same time like an expert street food chef.

OXO Games Studio bring you a brand new cooking game in the casual games, fun games and idle games category with this food cooking chef game. Use your top chef skills and expert time-management abilities to overcome the challenging stages of the game. Serve a variety of delicious foods to your valuable customers and earn rewards. Play now and become the best food cooking chef.

FEATURES:
- A ton of exciting and challenging levels
- Challenging gameplay that always keeps you on the edge of your seat
- Awesome game mechanics that really challenge your management skills
- Buy more kitchen equipment to help complete your goals more quickly
- Use magical candy and auto complete robot if you can’t complete order in time
- Amazing HD Graphics
- Super fun and easy to play
- Free to play forever
- No In-App Purchases
- No Wi-Fi required
and much more…

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:
OXO Apps Website: http://oxoapps.com
Join our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/oxoapps

WE LOVE TO HEAR:
*If you like this Food Cooking Chef, a management game, then Rate and Review and if something went wicked or you have any recommendation then please give your valued feedback at hello@oxoapps.com.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR CUSTOMERS:
* This is free game especially for Food games, Cooking games, Casual games and Simulation game lovers but it contains third party ads.
